title: Game locks computer
body:
The game completely freezes my computer. This started after 7.11. I have done a game repair and downloaded the hextech repair tool which identified the crash, but had no solutions. It confirmed my system meets specs.

The first few times it happened when I alt-tabbed in/out of the game (which I used to be able to do just fine), but now it happens anywhere from game load screen to inside the game with no specific input.

Any thoughts?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: You mentioned that the HRT was able to notice your game was crashing, so I'd like to start troubleshooting there. Hit up our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and test out the steps there to make sure your client doesn't happen to have some corrupted files laying around.
